GUI

Class BottomRightContentModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.BottomRightContentModel

  • public class BottomRightContentModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for holding bottom right content of window. It has 2 bottons and one additional content. These 2 buttons are topButton and topButton, additional content is stored via Jpanel additionalcontent.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Basic constructor.

      • BottomRightContentModel

        public BottomRightContentModel()
        Basic constructor. It creates new contentPane, bottomButton and topButton. It inserts each content in content pane.
